LanguageData.Seat_Cushion.label: sitting cushion
LanguageData.Seat_Cushion.description: A simple cushion for sitting on, popular amongst the tribes. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Seat_Bench.label: bench
LanguageData.Seat_Bench.description: A simple long platform on which multiple people may sit at the same time, not very comfortable but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Seat_SquareChair.label: square chair
LanguageData.Seat_SquareChair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair not specifically used for dining. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
